content: the district court in ljubljana made a decision on a legal case regarding the division of goods in an inheritance the deceased persons estate was valued at 834585 eur and the court determined that the widow and two daughters are the heirs the daughter is entitled to half of the inheritance while the remaining half is to be divided equally between two grandsons the court opened inheritance proceedings without a probate hearing and issued an inheritance order the costs of the proceedings will be paid by the heirs based on their share of the estate the text also provides instructions for lodging an appeal including the time limit required documents and payment of court fees the appeal must be submitted to the ljubljana high court the text concludes with the date of september 30 2021

metadata.cost: no costs with 8'345.85 EUR inheritance value
